title: Who is the sculptor for the super-deformed figurines?
body:
My order for the super-deformed figurines for Nami and Leona arrived today, well packaged and very promptly, and when I opened the boxes I discovered that the quality of the figurines is incredible!

These are extremely cute, and the sculpt for Nami especially is really well done.  Is there any information about who actually sculpted these?  You definitely need to give them more work!

replies.body:
Seems to be some confusion from people here. "super deformed" is a well established style of character figure/model. Some might refer to them as "chibi", generally immense heads on little/disproportionate bodies (thus deformed).

Most refer to the statues on the merch store as (standard) figures.

Nothing s/he said is a complaint, if anything every line is filled with praise. Please read.

I think your use of the words "super-deformed" are a bad choice. It makes it unclear on whether you're being positive or negative about the figurines even though later on you go onto a positive road.
